name: Dragon Tax Return Simulator 2015
description:
Welcome to Dragon Tax Return Simulator 2015

See the world through the eyes of a dragon. Fiddle with paperwork. Figure out arcane rules. Do lots of addition.

Need more desk space? Play in luxurious Fullscreen Mode at Github.

Wanna play offline? Go to Fullscreen Mode at Github, and press ctrl-p to make your fantasy taxes a reality. More info about print and play mode.

Want more links? Here's the source code. Here's the Ludum Dare submission page.
